page.title: 14 RECREATION.
page.content: {ASHLEIGH ROAD TENNIS,BOWLING AND {CROQUET CLUB.}In Ashleigh Road there is a bowling green,tennis courts and a croquet court. The club has been opened for 60 years.It has a privet club but you can go along with a member.the bowlers go in for all North Devon Championships. {SPORTS HALLS.}Newport Church Hall has badminton lessons and dance lessons. Bear Street church hall. At the church in bear Street you can play badminton,you can go dancing. {ROCK PARK.}Rock park has five tennis courts and a private bowling club.People can apply to the council to play cricket on the green at summer.In winter people can apply to the council to play football on the same green they have a fort and a play ground with swings and a slides etc.
